    About

STARCK

Starck is a fictional company based on an existing company called Steelcase. I had a strong attraction to the products Steelcase offers specifically their office chairs and I also appreciate what Steelcase does for the workplace. I chose to use their website structure and tailor it to a more niche company that only produces office chairs. I believe this website represents an ideal look and feel of a modern and successful company's websites.

Website Github

Producing An Effective WebSite

Starck is a national company that produces premium office chairs for businesses of all sizes. In developing this site I gained experience producing a website that matches the level of quality a company such as Starck would demand and expect from a website.

Leveraging a JavaScript Library

As the digital space evolves, developers are given better and more efficient tools and users expect a faster and more native experience. Building with React enables developers to produce more robust and scalable websites and applications with more control and enjoyment. Resulting in a better end user experience.

Responsive Development

More and more users make their initial visit to a website through their smart phones and then later revisit the site on a desktop or laptop. Ensuring the experience on both devices is congruent and seamless is incredibly import for building trust and establishing a sense of professionalism within our customers.
